abstract.text: Variant holds a value of different core data types.

inlineContent.text: Variant values can be: integers, double precision floating points, booleans,
strings or 2D points. They can also be arrays of any of the
atom values, where all the items of the array are the same.

abstract.text: Core library for creating applications for systems thinking and simulation.
ValueType specifies a data type of a value that is used in interfaces.
Type representing two-dimensional points.
Containment and management of design objects and their history.
